entries.title_d: Even though you lost the last executive for the company, they had a back up plan. Another executive is waiting to enter the system but needs an escort through the system.
entries.title: Yavin System: Escort the Yavin Mining Co. Executive
entries.thanks_4: I have a deadline to make. Let's keep moving.
entries.thanks_3: Next time, try to destroy them faster.
entries.thanks_2: You would have done better if you had followed my instructions.
entries.thanks_1: So you do have some talent. Good!
entries.taunt_5: The might of the great fireball is on my side!
entries.taunt_4: Do not fear them my brothers. They do not have faith!
entries.taunt_3: I shall be traveling to nirvana soon.
entries.taunt_2: You have taken your last piece of holy ground.
entries.taunt_1: We will show you company men what it is like to become one with the debris.
entries.shields_depleted: Well, there went our shields. I need you to get them off of us immediately.
entries.reason_5: Aren't you the pilot who lost my successor? Never mind, just get me to the station.
entries.reason_4: Aren't you the pilot who lost my successor? Never mind, just get me to the station.
entries.reason_3: Aren't you the pilot who lost my successor? Never mind, just get me to the station.
entries.reason_2: Aren't you the pilot who lost my successor? Never mind, just get me to the station.
entries.reason_1: Aren't you the pilot who lost my successor? Never mind, just get me to the station.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the arrival location and wait for the arrival of the new executive.
entries.quest_location_d: The new executive will meet you in the Yavin system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the new executive through the system and protect him from any of the Debris Cultists who might try to stop him.
entries.panic_5: You distract them while I try to sneak away.
entries.panic_4: Maybe you should try using your...what are they called...oh yeah blasters on them.
entries.panic_3: Remember take out the lead fighter first.
entries.panic_2: Stop your loafing and get in there.
entries.panic_1: Time for you to get to work.
entries.hull_half: You are supposed to protect me. My hull is cracking...get them off of me!
entries.goodbye_5: Someday you might amount to something.
entries.goodbye_4: It is a good thing I was there to direct you. We could have been in real trouble out there.
entries.goodbye_3: I am proud of you. With you skills and my leadership we could go far.
entries.goodbye_2: Good work, pilot. The company certainly could use someone like you around.
entries.found_loc: Arrival location of the executive transport has been sent to your flight computer.
entries.failed_protect: You lost another one? I know we have alot of executives but we will eventually run out. Maybe you should come back to the station for a while.
entries.failed_destroy: You lost another one? I know we have alot of executives but we will eventually run out. Maybe you should come back to the station for a while.
entries.complete: The executive is safely at our headquarters. Return to Yavin station.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Wait at this location for our executive transport to jump into the system.
entries.abort: Hey, you were hired to do a job. If you leave us out here we are going to fall into the same situation as that last executive.
